Package directedTree

Class DefaultDirectedTree<V>

java.lang.Object
directedTree.DefaultDirectedTree<V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirectedTree<V>
public class DefaultDirectedTree<V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirectedTree<V>
This class implements a Directed tree through a pointer to its root and several methods to operate over it. All the methods necessary to the project are implemented.

  • Constructor Summary

    DefaultDirectedTree()
